help: income - Explains how you make points
balance [@User] - Allows you to look at your or another users balance
gamble <all \|\| number \|\| help> - Allows you to gamble for more points
add <amount> [@User] - Takes money from the bank and gives it to the target
remove <amount> [@User] - Gives money to the bank and takes it from the target
shop - Displays what you can use your points for
buy <item> - Allows you to buy items from the shop
ping - Gets the bot's response time
